channel.title: Markdown on A Place for Poor Examples
channel.description: Recent content in Markdown on A Place for Poor Examples

item.title: New Blog!
item.description: I’ve just ended a very long relationship that was hideously overdue for some closure. That’s right - I’ve left wordpress. It’s a great platform if you can’t make a website or just don’t care about the details. But it’s a little less than I was looking for. So I’ve decided to get minorly techy and build a nice static site to hold all my blog entries. A thousand thanks goes to @dreikanter for writing a simple converter of the wordpress XML format to markdown.
